name: fan-tailed vulture
dieMessage: the fan-tailed @c-bold-on@@c-magenta@vulture@c-reset@'s lifeless corpse falls to the fan-tailed floor.

attackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ swipes at @player-name@ with its razor-sharp talons!
The @npc-color-name@ latches onto @player-name@ with its talons and rips into @player-name@'s flesh!

criticalAttackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ swoops down at @player-name@ at an incredible rate of speed and rips deeply into @player-name@'s flesh, sending a mist of @c-bold@@c-red@BLOOD@c-reset@ across the surrounding area!
The @npc-color-name@ pecks deeply into @player-name@'s flesh, appearing to enjoy the taste of @player-name@'s flesh!

idleMessages.message: A @npc-color-name@ hops around the brush searching for carrion.
